page.title: 16TRAVELLING TO SCHOOL
page.content: {James:}Every day I walk to school on my own. I don't walk very far. Mrs. Finch is the lollypop lady who helps you across the road. {Charles:}Mum drives me up to school nearly every day. Mrs. Sealey sometimes takes me to school. We park in Mason News car park. {Susie:}I walk to school and I go with my Mummy. It is round the corner and across the road, up the hill and across the road again. It takes about ten minutes. The roads are quite quiet {Emma:}My Mummy goes to school every morning but she has to stop every two minutes. She picks up three people and sometimes five. We all park in the teachers' car park. It is usually noisy and there is quite a lot of traffic about. It takes ten minutes to get there. It is very crowded in the car.
